detail_desc: Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets.
One-shoulder top in soft jersey. Narrow strap over one shoulder and a wide, embroidered flounce over the other shoulder.

Shirt in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim. Relaxed fit with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.

Straight-cut blouse in airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with a V-neck, pleat down the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
V-neck blouse in an airy, textured cotton weave with buttons down the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a rounded hem.
V-neck blouse in an airy, textured cotton weave with buttons down the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with a decorative pompom trim and embroidery. V-neck, round, spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with a decorative pompom trim and embroidery. V-neck, round, spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with a decorative pompom trim and embroidery. V-neck, round, spaghetti shoulder straps, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Lined.
Calf-length wrapover skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with ties at the waist and a wide flounced trim around the hem.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with long sleeves and gathered, buttoned cuffs. Double layer at the top of the front, a gathered seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with long sleeves and gathered, buttoned cuffs. Double layer at the top of the front, a gathered seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with long sleeves and gathered, buttoned cuffs. Double layer at the top of the front, a gathered seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with long sleeves and gathered, buttoned cuffs. Double layer at the top of the front, a gathered seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with long sleeves and gathered, buttoned cuffs. Double layer at the top of the front, a gathered seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Long skirt in a crinkled weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered tiers for added width. Partly lined.
Biker ankle boots in imitation leather with decorative tabs and metal buckles at one side and a zip at the other. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 3 cm.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and flutter sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and frill trim at the top.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Oversized top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
3/4-length leggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.

Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and concealed elastication under the bust for added support. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and medium coverage at the back. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit is partly recycled.

Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with a sculpting effect on the waist and bum. Adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Gathers at the sides, wide ties to define the waist, and medium coverage at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative ties, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative ties, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Short beach dress in an airy cotton weave containing glittery threads. Round neckline with a V-neck opening and narrow ties at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered tiers at the hem for added width.
Long beach kaftan in airy jersey containing glittery threads. Long, wide sleeves with cut-out sections at the top and a drawstring at the cuffs. Drawstring at the waist and high slits in the sides.
Long kaftan in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and long, wide sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Flounces down the back and front, and a seam with a drawstring at the waist.

Fully lined swimsuit with a cut-out section at the sides and back. Adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Deep V-neck with a decorative metal fastener at the front, concealed elastication under the bust and ties at the back. High-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Basic, long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Basic, long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Basic, long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Boots in satin with a stretchy shaft. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 6.5 cm.
Fitted top in soft, patterned modal jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Fitted top in soft, patterned modal jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.

Oversized, calf-length dungaree dress in cotton twill. Relaxed, straight style with straps that fasten at the front with a button, an open chest pocket, large patch front pockets, a back pocket and a loop at one side. Unlined.

Oversized, calf-length dungaree dress in cotton twill. Relaxed, straight style with straps that fasten at the front with a button, an open chest pocket, large patch front pockets, a back pocket and a loop at one side. Unlined.
Bandeau bras in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the hem. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and side support. No fasteners.
Calf-length skirt in jersey made from a viscose blend. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in jersey made from a viscose blend. High waist with covered elastication, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with covered elastication at the waist.

Lined bandeau bikini top with a round, covered buckle at the front and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps with flounces that have overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top, and side support.

Lined bandeau bikini top with a round, covered buckle at the front and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps with flounces that have overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top, and side support.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, flounces with overlocked edges at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, flounces with overlocked edges at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text print on the front. Jersey-lined drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short skirt in a slightly stretchy, patterned weave with a wrapover, pleated front and adjustable tab with a metal fastener at one side. Concealed buttoning on the inside of the waistband and shaping darts at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in lace with a V-neck, seam with a lace band at the waist and a flared peplum. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in superstretch jersey with a slight sheen. Low, elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in superstretch jersey with a slight sheen. Low, elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in superstretch jersey with a slight sheen. Low, elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Maxi dress in softly draping viscose jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Maxi dress in softly draping viscose jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Maxi dress in softly draping viscose jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Maxi dress in softly draping viscose jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Straight cut with a slit in one side. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Straight cut with a slit in one side. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Straight cut with a slit in one side. Unlined.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in softly draping satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined at the top. Shorts with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and wide legs.
Hair claws in metal and plastic. Size 3.5 cm.
